title: From A Virtual Meeting In 2021 To Delaware - A Timeline Of Quad Summits
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi landed in Philadelphia Saturday to begin his three-day US trip with the Quad Leaders' Summit being held in Wilmington, Delaware.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi landed in Philadelphia Saturday to begin his three-day US trip with the Quad Leaders' Summit being held in Wilmington, Delaware.

title: Heat Stress: New Research Shows Lower Threshold, Urgent Need For Action
content: New research shows that the human body's ability to tolerate heat and humidity is lower than previously thought, with a critical wet-bulb temperature threshold closer to 31 degrees Celsius.
summary: New research shows that the human body's ability to tolerate heat and humidity is lower than previously thought, with a critical wet-bulb temperature threshold closer to 31 degrees Celsius.

title: "Indian Community Making Positive Impact Across Sectors": PM Modi In US
content: Praising the Indian community and their achievements in the United States, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said that the community has distinguished itself in the USA, making a positive impact across diverse sectors.
summary: Praising the Indian community and their achievements in the United States, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said that the community has distinguished itself in the USA, making a positive impact across diverse sectors.

title: Baby Brains Recognise Eye Contact From Robots Too, New Study Finds
content: The study, published in Biological Psychology, highlights the growing importance of understanding how infants interact with technology and the potential impact of robots on early social development.
summary: The study, published in Biological Psychology, highlights the growing importance of understanding how infants interact with technology and the potential impact of robots on early social development.

title: Watch: Indian Community's Big Welcome For PM Modi As He Lands In US
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived to an enthusiastic welcome in Philadelphia as he kicked off his three-day visit to the United States, on Saturday.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived to an enthusiastic welcome in Philadelphia as he kicked off his three-day visit to the United States, on Saturday.

title: India's 1st Cancer Genome Atlas Launched Ahead Of Quad's 'Cancer Moonshot' Initiative
content: A high profile global initiative to tackle cancer called the 'Cancer MoonShot' will be announced on the sidelines of the Quad Summit.
summary: A high profile global initiative to tackle cancer called the 'Cancer MoonShot' will be announced on the sidelines of the Quad Summit.

title: PM Modi Arrives In US For 3-Day Visit, Will Meet Biden, Quad Leaders Soon
content: PM Modi has arrived in the US for his 3-day official visit during which he will hold several bilateral meetings and attend the strategic Quad summit. He is also scheduled to attend the the 'Summit of the Future' at the UN General Assembly in New York
summary: PM Modi has arrived in the US for his 3-day official visit during which he will hold several bilateral meetings and attend the strategic Quad summit. He is also scheduled to attend the the 'Summit of the Future' at the UN General Assembly in New York

title: When PM Told Obama - 'Your Limousine Is As Big As My Mother's House'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi told Barack Obama in 2014 that the size of the then-US president's car was almost as big as the house his mother lived in.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi told Barack Obama in 2014 that the size of the then-US president's car was almost as big as the house his mother lived in.

title: 37 Killed In Israeli Air Strike On Beirut, Says Lebanon
content: The death count from an Israeli air strike targeting Hezbollah military commanders in Beirut's southern suburbs has risen to 37 dead, Lebanon's health ministry said on Saturday.
summary: The death count from an Israeli air strike targeting Hezbollah military commanders in Beirut's southern suburbs has risen to 37 dead, Lebanon's health ministry said on Saturday.

title: PM Modi's 3-Day US Visit Begins, Will Attend Quad Summit, Hold Talks With Biden
content: PM Modi in US Live Updates: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today left for his three-day US Visit. The Prime Minister will attend the Quad summit and will hold bilateral talks with US President Joe Biden.
summary: PM Modi in US Live Updates: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today left for his three-day US Visit. The Prime Minister will attend the Quad summit and will hold bilateral talks with US President Joe Biden.

title: "Kids Were Playing...": Israeli Strike Kills 22 In Gaza, Say Palestinians
content: Palestinians said an Israeli strike killed at least 22 people in a school sheltering displaced people in southern Gaza City on Saturday, while the Israeli military said the attack targeted a command centre of Hamas.
summary: Palestinians said an Israeli strike killed at least 22 people in a school sheltering displaced people in southern Gaza City on Saturday, while the Israeli military said the attack targeted a command centre of Hamas.

title: In Today's Quad Meet, Strong Focus On Peace, Stability In Indo-Pacific
content: The annual Quad summit at US President Joe Biden's hometown Wilmington tonight is expected to finalise initiatives to boost cooperation in the Indo-Pacific. Prime Minister Narendra Modi is scheduled to attend the major global strategic event.
summary: The annual Quad summit at US President Joe Biden's hometown Wilmington tonight is expected to finalise initiatives to boost cooperation in the Indo-Pacific. Prime Minister Narendra Modi is scheduled to attend the major global strategic event.

title: Yellowstone To California: Cat's 1200 Km Odyssey Ends In Heartwarming Reunion

title: India, Germany Decide To Expand Ties In Renewable Energy, Mobility Sectors
content: Ahead of German Chancellor Olaf Scholz's visit to India, New Delhi and Berlin have decided to shore up cooperation in the areas of renewable energy, urban development, agroecology and mobility.

title: In A First, White House Engages With Pro-Khalistan Groups, Gives Assurance

title: Chechen Warlord Accuses Elon Musk Of "Remotely Disabling" His Cybertruck
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has been accused by Chechen leader Ramzan Kadyrov of "remotely disabling" his Cybertruck, which was outfitted with a machine gun and sent to the frontline of Russia's war in Ukraine.
summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has been accused by Chechen leader Ramzan Kadyrov of "remotely disabling" his Cybertruck, which was outfitted with a machine gun and sent to the frontline of Russia's war in Ukraine.

title: Iran Unveils New Drone, Missile As Tensions Rise In Middle East
content: The Middle East has been in turmoil since Iran-backed group Hamas attacked Israel on October 7 sparking war in Gaza and drawing in Iranian allies around the region.

title: Man Arrested In Italy Over Murder Of Two Australian Women In 1977
content: The bodies of Suzanne Armstrong, 27, and Susan Bartlett, 28, were discovered at their house in Easey Street, Melbourne, on January 13, 1977, with multiple stab wounds.

title: Polar Bear Appears In Iceland For 1st Time In 8 Years, Shot Dead By Police
content: A polar bear that made a rare appearance outside a cottage in a remote Icelandic village was shot by police after being deemed a threat to local residents.
summary: A polar bear that made a rare appearance outside a cottage in a remote Icelandic village was shot by police after being deemed a threat to local residents.

title: "Have 6 Months": Indian Man Diagnosed With Cancer In US, Seeks H-1B Guidance
content: The H-1B visa is a non-immigrant visa that allows US companies to employ foreign workers in specialty occupations that require theoretical or technical expertise.
summary: The H-1B visa is a non-immigrant visa that allows US companies to employ foreign workers in specialty occupations that require theoretical or technical expertise.
